chapter.title: Examples
chapter.para: This chapter presents some examples using the protocol notation.

section.title: Buyer Seller Protocol
section.para:
This example shows how a Buyer participant and
Seller participant may interact in an ordering
process.

section.title: Credit Check Protocol
section.para:
This example shows how a Client role performs a credit check
against a CreditAgency role.

section.title: Purchasing Goods Conversation
section.para:
This example shows how a protocol can be defined that 'implements' the
previous two protocol examples.
